Maven Echo Plugin
Last Published: 2013-04-03  | Version: 0.2-SNAPSHOT
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

echo:echo

Full name:

com.soebes.maven.plugins:echo-maven-plugin:0.2-SNAPSHOT:echo

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • The goal is thread-safe and supports parallel builds.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
echos List - The messages you would like to print out. 
   ..
   <configuration>
     <echos>
       <echo>Message Line Nr. 1</echo>
       <echo>Message Line Nr. 2</echo>
     </echos>
   </configuration>
   ..

logLevel EchoMojo$LogLevels - This will define in which logging level the given messages will be printed out. Their exist the following logging levels:
  • INFO
  • WARNING
  • ERROR
  • DEBUG

Default value is: INFO.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
verbose boolean - This will turn on verbose behavior and will print out all information.
Default value is: false.

Parameter Details

echos:

The messages you would like to print out. 
   ..
   <configuration>
     <echos>
       <echo>Message Line Nr. 1</echo>
       <echo>Message Line Nr. 2</echo>
     </echos>
   </configuration>
   ..
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: Yes

logLevel:

This will define in which logging level the given messages will be printed out. Their exist the following logging levels:
  • INFO
  • WARNING
  • ERROR
  • DEBUG
  • Type: com.soebes.maven.plugins.echo.EchoMojo$LogLevels
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: INFO

verbose:

This will turn on verbose behavior and will print out all information.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: false
